mapper.sql:
FROM productReview a left join member b on a.memberSeq = b.memberSeq left join product c on a.productSeq = c.productSeq WHERE 1=1 AND a.productSeq = #{productSeq} AND DelNy = #{shDelNy}
AND rvSeq LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%') AND nm LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%') AND product_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%')
mapper.select:
SELECT a.rvSeq ,a.productSeq ,a.memberSeq ,a.title ,a.contents ,a.rvRegtime ,a.DelNy ,b.id ,b.nm ,c.product_name
ORDER BY a.rvSeq DESC

SELECT a.rvSeq ,a.productSeq ,a.memberSeq ,a.title ,a.contents ,a.rvRegtime ,a.DelNy FROM productReview a left join member b on a.memberSeq = b.memberSeq left join product c on a.productSeq = c.productSeq WHERE 1=1 AND a.rvSeq = #{rvSeq}
SELECT seq ,type ,defaultNy ,sort ,path ,originalName ,uuidName ,pseq FROM busan.productReviewUploaded WHERE 1=1 AND delNy = 0 AND pseq = #{rvSeq} ORDER BY type, sort
